data.name: Diabolus et Angelus
data.detailed_description:
Official Discord Server


About the Game

A story about Angels and Demons. Latin: Diabolus et Angelus. Play the part of a hacker who has seen more than he should. Immerse in this exotic world full of strange and glamorous people. Seductive. Fascinating. Mysterious... and everything in between.

You start noticing things, here and there... Then, they notice YOU.

Features


The Immersive Story.
Get hooked since the very first seconds. Walk the path that the main character has to pass through. Adapt to changes. Survive!

The Puzzles.
Solve puzzles to advance in the story. Get the answers you need. They will try to stop you.

The Tools.
Get help from several kind of tools. A computer. A phone. Among other devices and everyday gadgets.

The People.
You will meet many. Some are good. Some are bad. Do not worry, you will know...

Them.
VGhlIEdvZHMu

Gameplay


  • Keyboard/Mouse/Gamepad all supported.
  • First person perspective.
  • Point & Click like a visual novel but in full 3D.
  • Solve puzzles to advance in the story.

Immerse in this exotic world full of strange and glamorous people. Seductive. Fascinating. Mysterious. You start noticing things, here and there... Then, they notice YOU.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2Cores 2.0 Ghz 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2Cores 3.0 Ghz 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X El Capitan
  • Processor: 2Cores 2.0 Ghz 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
